jameelinst.rpkg.theme

jameelinst.rpkg.theme is an R package providing a pkgdown template for R packages developed at the Jameel Institute.

Installation

You can install the development version of jameelinst.rpkg.theme from GitHub with:

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("jameel-institute/jameelinst.rpkg.theme")

How to use

Add the following line to your R package’s DESCRIPTION file to use this template for your pkgdown website.

Config/Needs/website: jameel-institute/jameelinst.rpkg.theme
